korean: 오랜만에 친구를 만나서 카페에서 수다를 떨었다.
한 6개월 만에 만나는 거라 정말 반가웠어.
그동안 못 본 사이에 있었던 일들을 이야기했어.
회사 이야기, 연애 이야기, 가족 이야기 등등 할 얘기가 너무 많았어.
친구는 요즘 회사에서 프로젝트 때문에 바쁘다고 하더라.
나도 내 근황을 얘기하고 고민도 털어놨어.
친구가 잘 들어주고 조언도 해줘서 고마웠어.
카페 직원이 눈치를 주길래 그제야 나왔지.
친구 만나니까 기분도 좋아지고 에너지를 충전한 느낌이야.
역시 좋은 친구가 있다는 건 정말 소중한 일이야.
english: I met up with a friend after a long time and chatted at a cafe.
It was about 6 months since we last met, so I was, like, really happy to see them.
We talked about things that happened while we hadn't seen each other.
We had so much to talk about - work stories, dating stories, family stories, and so on.
My friend said they've been busy with a project at work lately.
I also talked about what's been going on with me and shared my worries.
I was grateful that my friend listened well and gave me advice.
We talked for 3 hours without realizing how time passed.
The cafe staff was giving us hints, so we finally left.
We promised to meet again next time and said goodbye.
Meeting my friend made me feel better and like I recharged my energy.
Having a good friend is honestly really precious.
Next time I should meet up more often.
